column4: Plus if it was a CD issue.. why does Knoppix work after I burned it?
Yes, it auto marks it
Well I tried it 4 times.. and I'm doing what Ubuntu told me to
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=2597829
Yes it boots, then when I get to the option screen, and go to any of the options, it just says crc error
Ok then, if it was the hard disk, why doesn't it boot?
Yeah it's hella weird :/
So said the HD
But that HD is formatted now.. so the problem lies with getting it installed
That might have been helpful 3 hours ago
Sorry an, I gotta split.
Are you marking the CD's as bootable when you burn them?
You don't want that option marked, I think
Does ubuntu boot when you put the CD in?
Sounds like you have a bad CD on your hands...
Or downloaded the file wrong.
- I tried 4 brands, I am downloading the right file, tried from 2 mirrors
Geez O_o thats weird...
You said your inittab wasn't working?
Try googling around for "missing inittab"
If you can get booted into the LiveCD some how or another you might be able to fix it.
I know :(
